title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal bbsTrim streamline Taiwan BBS data retrieval analysis. ‘bbsTrim’ support data retrieval GBIF, Taiwan BBS data stored. ‘bbsTrim’ also include population trend modelling, using TRIM (TRends Indices Monitoring data). Users can tailor species analysis, controlling data stratification, preparation, modeling. consulting Taiwan BBS team ensure ‘bbsTrim’ package using methods official products. R package, ‘bbsTrim’ can easily integrated R programming processes. goal expand Taiwan BBS data access broader R-society Taiwan.
